data.name: Abandon Ship - Official Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The Official Soundtrack for Abandon Ship includes all of the rousing, epic orchestral music from the game, remastered by the original composer Aaron Miller.

The album includes the following tracks:

  • Abandon Ship (Main Theme)
  • Head Hunters
  • Beyond The Great Divide
  • Battle Of The Prodigal Son
  • From The Silence To The Resound
  • Big Game Hunting
  • Folly's End
  • Skin Merchant's Lament
  • His First Children
  • Battle In The Tropics
  • Return To Landfall
  • Voltraré

All files are supplied in 320kbps MP3 format.

These tracks can be found in your Steam folder in:
\Steam\steamapps\common\Abandon Ship\Soundtrack

If you are having trouble downloading the files from Steam, follow these steps:

  • Navigate to Abandon Ship in your Steam Library.
  • Select View Downloadable Content.
  • Ensure the Install checkbox is enabled for the Soundtrack to begin the download. Note: you may need to uncheck and then re-check the box to ensure the download begins.
